data.content:
noun
plural -tions
[count] an amount, figure, etc., that is almost correct and is not intended to be exact :an approximate amount, figure, etc.
These numbers are only approximations [=estimates] but they give us some idea of what we can afford.
This isn't an exact figure but I think it's a good/rough approximation of what the land is worth.
something that is similar to something else
The color of the paint isn't the exact same color as the vase, but it's a close approximation.
usually + of or to
The astronauts train in a room that provides an approximation of conditions in space.
There's little more than a vague approximation to the truth in their story.

Danh từ
số lượng khoảng chừng, con số xấp xỉ
3000 students each year would be an approximation
áng chừng có 3000 sinh viên mỗi năm
sự xấp xỉ, sự gần đúng
